Plot: When the skeleton of his murdered predecessor is found, Sheriff Sam Deeds unearths many other long-buried secrets in his Texas border town.
Title: Lone Star
Actors: Stephen Mendillo, Stephen J. Lang, Chris Cooper, Elizabeth Peña
tomatoConsensus: Smart and absorbing, Lone Star represents a career high point for writer-director John Sayles -- and '90s independent cinema in general.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 15 wins & 16 nominations.
